title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
summary:
France, 1770. Marianne, a painter, is commissioned to do the wedding
	portrait of Heloise, a young woman who has just left the convent.
	Heloise is a reluctant bride to be and Marianne must paint her without
	her knowing. She observes her by day, to paint her secretly.

title: Nomadland
summary:
A woman in her sixties who, after losing everything
	in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American
	West, living as avan-dwelling modern-day nomad.

title: Promising Young Woman
summary:
Nothing in Cassie's life is what it appears to be -- she's wickedly smart,
	tantalizingly cunning, and she's living a secret double life by night.
	Now, an unexpected encounter is about to give Cassie a chance to right the wrongs from the past.

title: I Killed My Mother
summary:
Teenaged Hubert views his mother with disdain and feels
	guilty about it. He is consumed by this love-hate relationship and passes
	through the turbulence of adolescence by engaging in illicit affairs.

title: Amour
summary:
Octogenarian couple Georges and Anne's happy life comes
	to a halt, when Anne suffers from a stroke and Georges must do everything
	possible to help her recover.

title: The Hours
summary:
As Virginia Woolf begins writing her novel 'Mrs Dalloway',
	in the future, Laura Brown and Clarissa Vaughan find solace in the novel
	and read to escape their monotonous life.

title: Brokeback Mountain
summary:
Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and
	emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to
	their respective girlfriends.

title: The Father
summary:
A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages.
	As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his
	own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

title: Sound of Metal
summary:
A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into freefall when
	he begins to lose his hearing.

title: Minari
summary:
A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search
	of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks,
	they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

title: Midsommar
summary:
Dani's psychological trauma affects her relationship with Christian,
	her lover. However, when they visit their friend's ancestral commune in an effort to mend things,
	it changes their lives forever.

title: Soul
summary:
A jazz musician, stuck in a mediocre job, finally gets his big break.
	However, when a wrong step takes him to the Great Before, he tries to help an infant soul in
	order to return to reality.

title: Malcolm & Marie
summary:
A filmmaker on the brink of Hollywood glory and his girlfriend, whose
	story made his career, find themselves pushed towards a reckoning as a single tumultuous night
	decides the fate of their relationship.

title: Knives Out
summary:
The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan
	Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for
	sure - everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect.

title: Call Me by Your Name
summary:
In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student
	and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.
